Dear Graydons
I raise a question about bonding. Presently,
the president is bonded for $10,000 and the treasurer is
bonded for $10,000. Since the president, as such, does
not handle the funds, I question whether or not he need be
bonded. Second, I question if bond of treasurer should
not be raised to $20,000. In other words, I’d suggest we
drop bond on oresIdent, and increase bond on treasurer to
#20,000. What do you say? The premium then would remain
the same as now — $50.
